OrgName: John Wiley & Sons, Inc. and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries Wiley Periodicals, Inc., Wiley Subscription Services, Inc., Crossknowledge, Inc., Deltak edu, LLC, and Profiles International, LLC
activities: John Wiley & Sons, Inc. and its subsidiaries receive personal information directly from individuals, via organizations that we work with or through website technologies. The personal information is obtained to carry out obligations arising from contracts and the provision of services; to send periodic catalogues; provide information about other products, events and services that are similar to those requested by an individual; internal business and research purposes related to websites and products; notify individual about changes to websites, products and services; producing personalized reports and continuing validation of such reports; and to provide and respond to any requests or queries raised by the individual.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, address, telephone number, email address, IP addresses, educational and professional interests and background information, usernames and passwords, payment information such as debit card and credit card, communication preferences
